alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 6:24PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Logan and central Scott Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 624 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oliver, or 9 miles west of Waldron, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Oliver... Echo... Morgan Springs... Bates... Black Fork... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Liberty... Ione... Elm Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
